creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: constructed like an apron; larger unlined part has center embroiderd section with geometric pattern squares; borders of plain and embroidered strips on three sides; two corners have layered squares with embroidered center and outer loops; smaller lined part has small embroidered hexagons and is considerably lighter than other similar pieces; purple, tan, black, red; cut ties on both parts
title: Baby Carrier
